column1: #Text=, population 7500 ( 2011 ) , is the largest regional centre in Northern Quebec .
#Text=It was founded as a mining village in 1950 , and was incorporated as a municipality in 1954 .
#Text=The area has long been part of the Cree First Nation ( Aboriginal ) territory .
#Text=It was in the early 17th century that French explorers and traders , including Charles Albanel in 1671 , came to the Lake Chibougamau area .
#Text=However , no permanent European settlements were established at that time .
#Text=In the late 19th century , the area attracted the interest of mining prospectors .
#Text=When gold was discovered in 1903 , there were periods of intense exploration .
#Text=Due to difficulty of access , no lasting development took place until 1949 when copper was exploited , with the opening of a multi-metallic mine in the area .
#Text=Chibougamau started out as a company town but soon after , in 1954 , it was incorporated as a municipality .
#Text=Many mines have exploited the area since .
#Text=While still thought of as a mining town , Chibougamau is now also the centre of a large logging and sawmill industry .
#Text=From southern Québec , the general route to Chibougamau-Chapais is Route 167 from Lac St-Jean , from where it is possible to travel to Trois-Rivières via Shawinigan and Roberval on Route 155 .
#Text=Western Québec and Ontario are connected to Chibougamau by Route 113 , connecting to Route 117 at Louvicourt near Val-d'Or .
#Text=Both routes are paved and have a speed limit of 90 km/h .
#Text=The North Road ( Route du Nord ) , an isolated gravel road , connects Chibougamau to the James Bay Road ( Route de la Baie-James ) .
#Text=, 501 4ième rue ( one block south of Hôtel Chibougamau ) , ☏ +1 418-547-2167 , toll-free : +1-800-806-2167 , fax : +1 418-547-0923 .
#Text=Intercar ( 2249 , rue St-Hubert , Jonquière ) operates a bus service to Chibougamau .
#Text=Their buses are available through most of the province , including Quebec City ( 7-7½ hours , $ 100 ) and the Saguenay region .
#Text=( YMT ) ( midway between Chibougamau and Chapais along Route 113 , 18 km southwest of Chibougamau ) , ☏ +1 418-748-3764 .
#Text=Daily flights with Air Creebec from Montréal-Dorval ( except Saturday ) .
#Text=There is no public transport in Chibougamau .
#Text=There are two local taxi services on 3rd Street :
#Text=( Centre d'intérêt minier de Chibougamau ) , 924 Route 167 nord , ☏ +1 418-748-4209 .
#Text=Museum in former Bruneau mine covering mining history from the ancient Pharaohs ' search for gold to modern times , plus a guided tour of the mine .
#Text=: Chibougamau is the largest regional centre to visit the aboriginal Cree communities of Oujé-Bougoumou ( 47 km west ) and Mistissini ( 86 km north ) .

#Text=Oujé-Bougoumou was designed by renowned Canadian architect Douglas Cardinal , who designed the Museum of Civilization in Gatineau , Québec , and has received UNESCO recognition as a model community due to sustainable development practices and cultural preservation .
#Text=Bears are sometimes visible at the municipal dump .
#Text=Ten days at the end of Feb to mid-March .
